title: Lunar Park Tickets
body: So I was right there, as it hit 7pm went to order ticket with rides for me and my brother then once I got to the checkout screen it just said you needed to purchase tickets kicked me off, and now my brother and I can't get the tickets. Thanks Riot, now my brother and I miss out on this event all because of the stupid webstie. I did everything right both my brother and I were there ready to buy tickets. Nothing happened once I got to the checkout screen and I lose my tickets.

replies.body: Oh man, that sucks. Did you make a support ticket about it? What did Riot have to say?
